channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- HC Custom WP-Admin URL
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- HC Custom WP-Admin URL

item.title: CVE-2022-1595|2024-08-03T00:10:03.550Z -- unknown -- hc%20custom%20wp-admin%20url
item.description: The HC Custom WP-Admin URL WordPress plugin through 1.4 leaks the secret login URL when sending a specific crafted request

item.title: CVE-2022-1594|2024-08-03T00:10:03.579Z -- unknown -- hc%20custom%20wp-admin%20url
item.description: The HC Custom WP-Admin URL WordPress plugin through 1.4 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack, allowing them to change the login URL
